oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis and X-ray crystal structure of a novel long chain acyclic phosphazene, N,N′-{dimethyl-bis(diphenylphosphiniminophosphorane)}ethylenediamine {(PhO)2P(O)N=PN(CH3)CH2}2, obtained via a Staudinger reaction
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BALAKRISHNA, MS
ABHYANKAR, RITA M
WALAWALKAR, MRINALINI G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: phosphazene
phosphinimines
staudinger reaction
x-ray structure
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The title compound was synthesized by the reaction of N,N′-dimethyl-N,N′-bis(diphenylphosphino)ethylenediamine with phosphoryl azide and characterized by mass spectrometry, microanalysis, and 31P and 1H NMR spectroscopy and the structure was confirmed by single crystal X-ray studies.
